summary: Focuses on two figures, sometimes Andrew Kötting, sometimes Toby Jones as the middle-aged John Clare. As they channel, in their own fashion, the psychic wound exposed by Clare.
cast: David Aylward|Freddie Jones|Toby Jones|Eden Kotting|Simon Kövesi|MacGillivray|Alan Moore|Iain Sinclair
title: By Our Selves
